notes.text:
This update for perl-DBI fixes the following issues:

  - CVE-2014-10401: Fixed incorrect permission on opening files via DBD::File drivers (bsc#1176492)
  - CVE-2014-10402: Fixed incorrect permission on opening files via DBD::File drivers (bsc#1176492)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.632 for Perl. DBD::File drivers can open files from folders other than those specifically passed via the f_dir attribute.
notes.title: CVE description

notes.text: An issue was discovered in the DBI module through 1.643 for Perl. DBD::File drivers can open files from folders other than those specifically passed via the f_dir attribute in the data source name (DSN). NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2014-10401.
notes.title: CVE description
